name: Flick Shot Rogues
summary: Flick Shot Rogues is a turn-based rogue-lite that turns movement into a skill shot! Aim and flick your hero to ricochet through levels, dodge enemy attacks, and smash your foes with crazy trick shots. Featuring near-endless replayability, fun upgrades, and a ton of mayhem.
